item.title: Rebuilding Alexa: How Amazon is mixing models, agents and browser-use for smarter AI
item.description: In rearchitecting the upgraded Alexa voice assistant, Amazon turned to model mixing to bring agentic capabilities to devices.

item.title: Nvidia CEO: Someday we’ll have 1B robotic cars on the road
item.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang predicted that someday we'll have a billion cars on the road and they will all be robotic cars.

item.title: Hugging Face launches FastRTC to simplify real-time AI voice and video apps
item.description: Hugging Face's new FastRTC library enables Python developers to build real-time voice and video AI applications in just a few lines of code.
